response.overview: Young-gil's mother Deok-ja died. Young-gil, who was so busy that he did nothing to his mother, submitted a death report and left with his son Jun-soo to clean up her house. Then, he discovered the meta-bus game that Deok-ja was playing, and you can see that she made a map of the place she wanted to go before her death. Young-gil and Jun-soo start the game to find out where Deok-ja really wanted to go.
response.title: ID_Younggil's Mom
